translation.en: You got a little on you!
-Come here, honey. -Oh, these hips don't lie.
translation.es: - Ven, cariño. - Mis caderas no mienten.

translation.en: -Rawr! -You like that? I love it! Come here.
This retirement thing is really working out.
translation.es: Esto del retiro sí que salió bien.

translation.en: [Alexei] Karl, we're ready to get the fuck out of here.
[Karl, over radio] At your service! Please come onboard.
Yeah. It's done. We're heading back now.
[Karl] Fasten your seatbelts. -Enjoy the ride. -♪ The 21st of September? ♪
Great job, Facundo. See you back at the mansion.
translation.es: Excelente, te veo en la mansión.

translation.en: [woman] Okay, sweetie, Dr. Becker will see you now.
translation.es: Bien, el Dr. Becker te atenderá.

translation.en: [Becker] If I can get you to take a nice deep breath in.
It's never too late to get that metal removed.
translation.es: No es tarde para sacar el metal ese.

translation.en: -[light metallic tapping] -Eh, it's not too bad.
How's the hearing in that left ear, Duncan?
Did you get all the shots I recommended?
Okay. If you lie down on your side, please.
And I'll get you to bring your knees up to your chest, please.
translation.es: Suba las rodillas hasta el pecho, por favor.

translation.en: When people ask me why I save the prostate exam till last,
translation.es: Y preguntan por qué reviso la próstata al final.

translation.en: I just think it's nice for my patients to have something fun to look forward to.
translation.es: Es lindo que mis pacientes ansíen un buen momento.

translation.en: Oh, I baked a pear tartine.
What are you looking forward to most about retiring?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que ansía hacer al retirarse?

translation.en: The most dangerous time for men is the year they retire.
translation.es: El año de retiro es el más peligroso.

translation.en: They take up some crazy sport.
They ditch their wife and fuck girls younger than their daughters.
translation.es: Dejan a la esposa, andan con chicas muy jóvenes.

translation.en: They think they're king of the world.
It's not always the things I test for that get you.
translation.es: Lo que mata no es lo que controlo.

translation.en: We got you covered for cancer and heart disease and basic human biology.
translation.es: Ya revisamos si tiene cáncer, enfermedades coronarias y demás.

translation.en: But sometimes the killer's in your head.
translation.es: El asesino está en la cabeza.

translation.en: The mental side of retirement. Phew.
Wow! This pie is great. Hmm.
[man] Yes, going through your financial report, the good news,
yes, is that you've got no financial worries at all.
translation.es: lo bueno es que no tiene de qué preocuparse.

translation.en: Will you be making the same charity donation again this year,
translation.es: ¿Este año hará la misma donación a la caridad?

translation.en: And from the same bank account,
the Montana Union Credit Bank, yes?
translation.es: el Banco de Crédito de Montana, ¿no?

translation.en: Damocles will be matching your pension contributions,
You have put away the maximum
and the company plan has seen it grow at a rate of a good six percent per year.
translation.es: y la empresa registró un crecimiento de 6 % anual en el monto.

translation.en: You can draw half of that on your official retirement date,
translation.es: Podrá sacar la mitad cuando se retire,

translation.en: Damocles will be cutting you a check
eight million two hundred and seven thousand
five hundred and twenty-three dollars and four cents.
translation.es: quinientos veintitrés dólares con cuatro centavos.

translation.en: You have properties in four states, yes?
I just need to know which one you'll be retiring to so--
translation.es: Necesito saber en cuál vivirá para...

translation.en: Keeping the old golf handicap down?
translation.es: ¿Sigue con el mismo hándicap en el golf?

translation.en: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
translation.es: Sí, aunque cruce por oscuras quebradas,

translation.en: Your rod and your staff comfort me...
translation.es: tu vara y tu bastón me infunden...

translation.en: And I will dwell in the house of the Lord forever.
translation.es: Y habitaré en la Casa del Señor por muy largo tiempo

translation.en: -You wanted to talk. -[Vivian] You watching me?
-It's good to see you, Duncan. -What happened to Michael?
translation.es: - Hola, Duncan. - ¿Qué le pasó a Michael?

translation.en: I figured you might show up, so I brought you this.
translation.es: Me imaginé que aparecerías, así que traje esto.

translation.en: Apparently, he'd been partying in his big-ass McMansion down in Chile
translation.es: Parece que la pasaba bien en su mansión de Chile

translation.en: for days when he got attacked.
Michael was the fourth dead Damocles agent in the past month.
translation.es: Michael fue el cuarto agente Damocles que murió el mes pasado.

translation.en: Our intel says Michael's killer is tied to a Russian outlet.
translation.es: Investigamos: el asesino de Michael está ligado a los rusos.

translation.en: They hired some Mexican hit man
by the name of Pedro Gonzalez Gonzales.
He's currently staking out in Belarus, Russia.
translation.es: Mantiene bajo perfil. Está en Bielorrusia.

translation.en: Your old boss, Blut, sanctioned a revenge hit.
translation.es: Blut, tu exjefe, autorizó matarlo en venganza.

translation.en: A million dollar bullet to tell this pendejo
translation.es: Una bala de un millón de dólares para decirle a ese pendejo

translation.en: that we are not to be fucked with.
translation.es: que con nosotros no se jode.

translation.en: Oh, don't be such a cry-baby.
He lets go of everybody at 50. You know that. Company fucking policy.
translation.es: Despide a todos los de 50, ya sabes, política corporativa.

translation.en: You can't be a hit man with Alzheimer's.
Get one of the young guys, then.
Technically, you're still active for the next two weeks.
translation.es: Técnicamente, seguirás activo dos semanas más.

translation.en: This needs somebody with more finesse, more...
translation.es: Este trabajo precisa de alguien más sutil, mucho más...

translation.en: [woman 1] ...got me some Lip Smackers for the store just like you said I should.
I got strawberry, I got raspberry, I got rhubarb.
translation.es: Tengo de frutilla, de frambuesa y de ruibarbo.

translation.en: -[woman 2] But do they taste good? -[woman 1] They do.
I was thinking, maybe in the summer,
I could do a promotional tie-in with the pies.
translation.es: los venda en promoción con las tartas.

translation.en: Do you remember that TV series that I was telling you about?
Mm-hmm. You have to start it from the beginning. I got it in the box across the street.
translation.es: Véala desde el principio. La conseguí enfrente.

translation.en: Now, it's British, but you can put the subtitles on.
-[woman 2] It sounds kind of religious. -It's not as religious as you might think.
translation.es: Parece que fuera religiosa. No tanto como cree.

translation.en: Oh, my, Jesus is a handsome man, isn't he?
I like dogs with human names.
I don't know anyone human named Rusty.
translation.es: No conozco a nadie llamado Rusty.

translation.en: -Isn't that a dog's name? -No, it's human.
translation.es: - ¿No es nombre de perro? - No, de persona.

translation.en: I want to take a picture of this moment.
translation.es: tomaré una foto de este momento.

translation.en: [man on TV] It's not about who you are or what you think...
translation.es: ...no se trata de quién eres, de qué piensas ni de cómo vives...

translation.en: There's a strong energy between us, right?
[man on TV] The bond between an elephant cub and its mother -is unmistakable... -[computer beeps]
translation.es: El vínculo entre la cría y la madre es indiscutible...

translation.en: Blut won't take no for an answer.
You didn't hang up, so I assume you want to know how much.
translation.es: No colgaste, seguro quieres saber cuánto.

translation.en: Two million. One now, one when it's done.
translation.es: Dos millones: mitad, ahora, mitad, después.

translation.en: This shit-spit really struggles with that two-letter word.
translation.es: El estúpido no acepta esa palabra de dos letras.

translation.en: What the fuck else you got going on?
You don't strike me as a man with a hobby.

translation.es: Adiós 30 segundos. Por Dios, carajo, ¿te retiraste...?

translation.en: -Are you retired or ret-- -[phone snaps shut]
It's $2 million. Don't make me fuckin' beg.
translation.es: Son dos millones, no me hagas rogar.

translation.en: Leave the file on the company server.
You don't have to be such--
Though, your description of me as a shit-spit didn't go unnoticed.
translation.es: Aunque me llamaste estúpido, lo cual, claramente, noté.

translation.en: Just talking to the Black Kaiser makes you nervous.
translation.es: Te pone nerviosa hablar con "el káiser negro".

translation.en: [Vivian] You should just forget about him and move on.
Who can forget about the Black Kaiser?
Unless you have a better way of putting him in our crosshairs
translation.es: Salvo que sepas cómo ponerlo en la mira

translation.en: and let's go with my plan
and send him to Belarus to die.
translation.es: Envíalo a Bielorrusia para que muera.

translation.en: he'll expect $1 million in his account before he makes a move.
translation.es: esperará hasta tener depositado el millón de dólares.

translation.en: I need authorization to make it happen.
As you know, swords are synonymous with Damocles,
translation.es: Como saben, las espadas y Damocles son similares,

translation.en: Owned by the great German general Arminius,
butcher of the Romans at Teutoburg Forest.
translation.es: el carnicero de los romanos en el bosque de Teutoburgo.

translation.en: The handle is made from Roman bone.
translation.es: El mango es de hueso de romanos.

translation.en: My father was a big fan of this kind of stuff.
translation.es: Mi padre era muy fanático de estas cosas.

translation.en: Thank you for your incredible sword show and touching story.
translation.es: Gracias por su espectáculo con la espada y por la historia conmovedora.

translation.en: Now, let's get down to business.
We have some questions regarding the purchase of Damocles.
translation.es: Tenemos dudas respecto de la compra de Damocles.

translation.en: Accounts show this year, your liabilities are at 29 million,
translation.es: Las cuentas muestran que hay un pasivo de veintinueve millones.

translation.en: yet next year your liabilities are predicted to be paid off.
translation.es: Sin embargo, parece que el año próximo la deuda quedará saldada.

translation.en: In fact, we were surprised to see that they have become revenue.
translation.es: Y nos sorprendió que se haya convertido en ingreso.

translation.en: This seems to be done in order to inflate the value of your company.
translation.es: Parece que se quisiera inflar el valor de la compañía.

translation.en: We control the pensions of our former employees.
translation.es: Controlamos las pensiones de nuestros exempleados.

translation.en: They pay into our fund, we match their contributions,
translation.es: Contribuyen con nuestro fondo, nosotros lo equiparamos

translation.en: It's our company policy that all our agents must retire at the age of 50.
translation.es: La política corporativa es que los agentes se retiren a los 50.

translation.en: We have a plethora of agents who have now reached this milestone.
translation.es: Tenemos una plétora de agentes que llegaron a este punto.

translation.en: Their combined fund adds up to $29 million.
translation.es: Su fondo, combinado, llega a veintinueve millones.

translation.en: How do you consider this income?
If our agents were to die in the field of duty
translation.es: Si nuestros agentes murieran mientras están de servicio
o a causa de algún accidente,

translation.en: the clause in their contract states that Damocles would be the beneficiary.
translation.es: una cláusula del contrato establece que Damocles sería la beneficiaria.

translation.en: And you are assuming they will die?
I don't assume they will die,
If you can uphold that guarantee,
we will move forward with this deal.
[in Russian] The train woke me up again.
[in Russian] Do you want to go somewhere else for a few days?
translation.es: ¿Quieres ir a otra parte durante unos días?

translation.en: Let the kid get a good night of sleep.
translation.es: Que el niño duerma bien una noche.

translation.en: You pay me for sex. My regular life is not for sale.
translation.es: Me pagas para tener relaciones. Mi vida personal no está en venta.

translation.en: Yes, I'll call maintenance right away.
[in Russian] A woman and her son are locked inside.
translation.es: Una mujer está encerrada con el hijo.

translation.en: These doors have high security deadlocks for our VIP guests.
translation.es: Las puertas tiene cerraduras de seguridad para los huéspedes importantes.

translation.en: We can't release it from the outside.
translation.es: No se pueden abrir desde afuera.

translation.en: [in Russian] I have to drill it.
[in Russian] Okay, but try to keep it down.
[bellman, in Russian] We are so sorry, sir.
Do you have authorization to hire me for the Belarus job?
Yes. The first 50 percent is sitting in a payable account, ready to go.
translation.es: La tengo. El 50 % está en una cuenta, listo para transferirlo.

translation.en: Okay, the job is done. I'll send you a picture.
translation.es: Bien, ya está hecho, te enviaré una foto.

translation.en: Vivian, somebody set me up over here. You better pray you have nothing to do with it.
translation.es: Vivian, es una trampa, más vale que no tengas nada que ver.

translation.en: [Evalina, in Russian] Come on, let's go. Don't look.
[woman, in Russian] Somebody call the police!
[in Russian] You make all this money from killing people?
We could have been killed up there.

translation.es: No vuelvas a acercarte a mí.

translation.en: [woman] How nice to see you, Ms. Vivian!
He's not answering my calls. What the fuck is he doing?
A cup of tea to calm down, Ms. Vivian?
This is not a convenient time.
I don't give a shit what time it is.
You tried to kill the Black Kaiser

translation.es: y acudiste a unos payasos mexicanos baratos?

translation.en: I told you we should leave him the fuck alone.
translation.es: Te dije que lo dejáramos en paz.

translation.en: -You worry too much. -You have to pay him everything now.
translation.es: - Te preocupas demasiado. - Hay que pagarle todo.

translation.en: I don't have to do shit until his birthday.
translation.es: No haré nada hasta su cumpleaños.

translation.en: Pay him the second half of his fee
so we don't have to look over our fucking shoulder
translation.es: así no deberemos andar con cuidado

translation.en: for the rest of our lives.
[Vivian] Whatever. As long as you pay him.
These are all the properties he owns?

translation.es: Sí, todas. No veo en cuál de ellas reside.

translation.en: I can't see where it says one of them is his actual permanent address.
translation.es: No veo en cuál de ellas reside.

translation.en: He moves around a lot. Yeah, I-- I know that from-- from his, uh, accounts.
translation.es: Se muda mucho. Lo sé, miro sus cuentas.

translation.en: I want to see these accounts.
The profit and loss, expenses. I want everything.
translation.es: Lás pérdidas y las ganancias, los gastos, quiero todo.

translation.en: Yeah, it's all in there, under V. V for Vizla.
translation.es: Todo está allí, en la V de Vizla.

translation.en: For 20 years, I-- I worked for him.
-You've been very helpful. -I can still be helpful.
I can call and s-send him a message.
That's how we do it. Talk to him. I'm good at that. And you can trace him.
translation.es: Es lo que hago: hablo con él. Podrán rastrearlo, o podemos vernos en una cafetería

translation.en: Or we could meet at a coffee shop
translation.es: Podrán rastrearlo, o podemos vernos en una cafetería

translation.en: He trusts me. He always says that.
translation.es: Él dice que confía en mí.

translation.en: "You and me, Paul, I trust you."
He does. Yes, he really trusts me. Yes!
translation.es: Sí. Èl sí que confía en mí. ¡Sí!

translation.en: [Sindy] Let's start with Florida. I have a perfect outfit.
translation.es: Vayamos a Florida, tengo la ropa perfecta.

translation.en: No, we didn't deliver any logs and we only deliver what we get asked.
translation.es: No, no enviamos troncos, solo lo que nos piden.

translation.en: Logs are expensive. It's not like they grow on trees, you know!
translation.es: Son caros, no salen de los árboles.

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but my woodpile got filled.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero tengo mucha leña.

translation.en: I mean, that doesn't just happen.
Sounds to me like you've got yourself a magic woodpile.
Golden goose would be better, but we don't get to pick and choose
translation.es: Preferiría un ganso de oro, pero no se elige

translation.en: what sort of supernatural events we witness.
[store owner] Oh, hey, there's your neighbor!
Did you happen to see anything peculiar
out by your place over the past couple days?
translation.es: cerca de su casa hace poco?

translation.en: Perhaps some sort of supernatural event of someone dumping a truckload of logs?
translation.es: ¿Algo sobrenatural o alguien que haya dejado troncos?

translation.en: -No. -This young lady rents up where you are.
translation.es: - No. - Ella renta una casa por allí.

translation.en: You can probably see her cabin from your place across the lake.
translation.es: Seguro ve la cabaña al otro lado del lago.

translation.en: Seems her woodpile got filled up as if by magic!
translation.es: ¡Le aparecieron troncos por arte de magia!

translation.en: -Shit! I'm so sorry. -Let it be. Let it be.
I should have fixed that door years ago.
Well, well, well, look who's having himself a birthday!
translation.es: Bueno, miren quién festejará su cumpleaños.

translation.en: And baking a Betty Crocker. So much better when you make it yourself.
translation.es: Se cocinará una torta. Mejor si es casera.

translation.en: You know, I got all sorts of fun party stuff.
I got streamers and balloons and poppers.
I got paper plates with Disney folk on 'em and napkins.
translation.es: Tengo platos de Disney y servilletas.

translation.en: -[inflating balloon] -You'll love these recipes just as much as I do.
translation.es: Ojalá les encante esta receta como a mí.

translation.en: ...you may find this process even more satisfying with the smell wafting...
translation.es: Será más satisfactorio cuando sientan el aroma...

translation.en: Hi there! Um, I'm looking for apartment 506.
What's it say on the door?
So, is your name Mr. Vizla?
-Mr. Duncan Viz-- -You want a drink before we get started?
I'm really just here regarding the questionnaire.
So, what are you into? Being hit?
Strangled? You like takin' it up the ass?
translation.es: ¿Qué te estrangulen o te lo metan por atrás?

translation.en: -What'd you say to me? -It's not him!
What'd you fucking say? What the fuck? My door!
Who the fuck are you? Fuck this!
-Do you have a fucking warrant? -Who do you pay rent to?
I didn't fucking touch her. You're paying for the fucking door!
translation.es: No la toqué. Pagarán esa puerta, carajo.

translation.en: -Who do you pay rent to?! -[man] Shit!
What are you fucking talking about?
-His name Lomas? -Yeah. That's his name. Why?
Nah, he's not here. We're moving to the next location.
translation.es: No está. Iremos a otro lado.

translation.en: Don't leave any witnesses behind, you hear me?
I'm serious. And call me from the next location.
translation.es: Hablo en serio. Llamen cuando lleguen.

translation.en: I think he's dead now, Sindy.
Good idea. Eggs and toast. You're paying this time, goddamn it.
translation.es: Sí, tostada con huevo. Te toca pagar.

translation.en: You live in the house with the big porch.
translation.es: Vive en la casa con ese porche.

translation.en: I live in the gray cabin, just across the lake.
translation.es: Vivo del otro lado del lago en la cabaña gris.

translation.en: -I'm so, so sorry. -[server] It's totally fine.
[man] ...give a shit if we stay here. -Hey, man. -The place is always empty.
translation.es: - A nadie le importa si vivimos aquí. - Ey, oye.

translation.en: I need you to answer a simple question, okay?
Who do you pay rent to?
-Bro, we don't live here! We don't pay. -[doorbell chimes]
translation.es: No vivimos aquí, no pagamos nada.

translation.en: -[man] Why are you doing this? -I don't--
Who the hell are you? Where's Shotgun Frank?
You should probably get the fuck out of here, sweetie.
What the fuck is going on in there?
Come on, let's get out of here.
No, ma'am. He's not here either.
-We got one more place to check. -That better be the place then, Facundo.
translation.es: - Queda un lugar más. - Y que sea ese, Facundo.

translation.en: -[man groans] -You okay? You're making a mess.
[woman] You're not from around here, are you?
You don't have the same look as people around here either.
translation.es: Tampoco te ves como la gente de aquí.

translation.en: Well, I'm not working anymore. I'm retired.
I was in the funeral business.
Well, people die traveling in foreign countries.
translation.es: La gente se muere cuando viaja a otros países.

translation.en: I go over and I take care of it.
translation.es: Yo voy y me hago cargo de eso.

translation.en: How many countries have you been to?
Most people don't even know 99 countries.
And I'm only at the As, so, yeah.
translation.es: Y aún sigo en la A, así que sí.

translation.en: You should give a class at school, here in town.
translation.es: Deberías enseñar en la escuela de aquí.

translation.en: Tell the kids about the world.
How many teachers have actually seen the places you have?
I don't know how to talk to kids.
translation.es: No sé cómo hablarle a un niño.

translation.en: -[man] I'll rip your fucking arms off! -Speak.
Yeah, we're all out of luck here, too. He ain't at this last location, either.
translation.es: Tampoco tuvimos suerte. Él no está aquí.

translation.en: -Go, girl! USA! USA! -I'll rip your spindly fucking arms off!
-What? -One, two, three. Can you get it done already, goddamn it?
You better tell Hilde her boyfriend is not gonna be happy
translation.es: Dile a Hilde que su novio no estará feliz

translation.en: if she doesn't find the Black Kaiser.

translation.es: Deja de pelear, no te muevas, rollo de carne.

translation.en: Yeah, I can't remember all that.
Better not call me again without a plan.
translation.es: No me llamen sin un plan.

translation.en: I'm sorry, it's really noisy in here. Can you repeat?
Unless you have a serious death wish.
translation.es: Salvo que tengan ganas de morir.
- Uno, dos, tres... - ¡Que no se mueva!

translation.en: I'm doing the best I can, okay?
-Fucking hell! -[Sindy] Oh, no, you killed him!
Let's get the fuck out of here.
Get back here, you fucking sacks of shit! -[Sindy] He's alive! -I'll fucking kill you!
translation.es: ¡Vuelvan, pedazos de mierda, los mataré, carajo!

translation.en: -Who the fuck do you think you are? -[screams]
All right, all right. One more time.
The kukri is an arterial weapon.
translation.es: El kukri es un arma de tipo arterial.

translation.en: -[kids] Stabbing! -There you go. Let's see what it can do.
-[kids cheer] -All right, all right, all right.
How do they bury people in India?
And if the man dies first, they'll burn the wife as well. Alive.
translation.es: Si el hombre muere primero, entierran a la mujer. Viva.

translation.en: -What clothes do they wear in Africa? -Summer clothes.
translation.es: - ¿Qué ropa usan en África? - De verano.

translation.en: Do they speak American in England?
All right. Have any of you ever seen...
a dead body that's been in the sun for three weeks?
translation.es: un cadáver que estuvo expuesto al sol?

translation.en: Well, take a look at this, then.
Here you go. Pay attention to his face.
You can hardly see it anymore.
That was a pretty cool knife.
That fucking accountant was hiding something.
translation.es: Ese contador de mierda ocultó algo.

translation.en: Hey, what are you guys looking for? You really think you're gonna find him?
translation.es: Ey, ¿qué buscan, chicos? ¿Creen que lo encontrarán?

translation.en: [Jane] You guys are so fucking boring.
You told me how much you like knives, so...
I thought this might be something.
It comes in black if you like that better.
translation.es: Si lo prefieres, viene en negro.

translation.en: -I don't know how to shoot. I-- -That's okay.
[Hilde] I would do anything for you, my love.
translation.es: Haría lo que fuera por ti, amor.

translation.en: Tell me again, what is it you plan to do?
I will kill him for you.
Shit! Imagine how much dope you can get for 200,000.
translation.es: ¡Mierda! Se puede conseguir tanta droga con 200 000.

translation.en: -[Hilde] Give me that. -Can we cash this?
[Sindy] What are you talking about? Let me see.
I got one more here made out to some fucking charity shit.
translation.es: Hay otro más para la caridad y esa mierda.

translation.en: Let's cash 'em all. We'll be rich.
Well, the charity is not what's important,
translation.es: Lo de la caridad no interesa para nada.

translation.en: Fuck me. The Montana Union Credit Bank in Triple Oak.
translation.es: ¡Mierda! El banco de Crédito de Montana en Triple Oak.

translation.en: Looks cold. Why the fuck would he live there?
translation.es: Un lugar frío. ¿Por qué vivir ahí?

translation.en: Looks like we're on the move.
[Sindy] Let's go. We have a long drive ahead of us.
translation.es: Vamos, hay que conducir, y estamos muy lejos.

translation.en: One thumb there, one right there. Right?
translation.es: Un pulgar aquí, el otro, aquí.

translation.en: Then when you feel you have the target, you squeeze the trigger nice and easy.
translation.es: Cuando tengas el objetivo en la mira, aprieta el gatillo suavemente.

translation.en: It's okay. We'll get you something else.
translation.es: Está bien, te traeré otra cosa.

translation.en: I have never heard about winter coffee before.
translation.es: Nunca escuché de un café invernal.

translation.en: I use bourbon and maple syrup.
translation.es: Uso bourbon y jarabe de arce.

translation.en: I used to have a dog.
We don't have to talk about it.
I had this job when I was 13.
I was Santa's helper at the library.
translation.es: Ayudaba a Santa en la biblioteca.

translation.en: this one day, it was just me and him there.
translation.es: ese día, solo estábamos él y yo.

translation.en: He was more drunk than usual.
translation.es: Estaba más ebrio que otras veces.

translation.en: He just came up to me.
So hard, I landed on the floor.
translation.es: Tan fuerte que caí al piso.

translation.en: I always imagined what it would be like...
I would have a gun in my hand.
translation.es: Tendría un arma en la mano.

translation.en: And then I would tell him what he did to me.
translation.es: Y le contaría lo que él me hizo.

translation.en: I guess I would tell him what he did.
Tell him how that day never left my thoughts.
translation.es: Le diría que jamás dejé de pensar en ese día.

translation.en: I would never have to see him again when I close my eyes.
translation.es: Nunca más lo vería al cerrar los ojos.

translation.en: Do you think it would be difficult to kill someone?
translation.es: ¿Crees que sería difícil matar a alguien?

translation.en: -How are you doing? What can I do you for? -I'm looking for a gift.
translation.es: ¡Hola, Sr. Duncan! ¿Cómo está? ¿Qué necesita? - Busco un regalo. - Vino al lugar perfecto.

translation.en: Well, you came to the right place.
translation.es: - Busco un regalo. - Vino al lugar perfecto.

translation.en: -It's for a girl. -Oh! What kind of gift?
translation.es: - Es para una chica. - Oh, ¿qué tipo de regalo?

translation.en: I got visuals on the target. Right there.
translation.es: Lo tengo en la mira. Allí está.

translation.en: [Facundo over radio] Sindy, he's coming your way.
Do I look like a mechanic?
I don't know. It just died.
translation.es: No sé. Se murió el auto.

translation.en: Did you call a tow truck?
Could I charge it in your car?
Do you live far from here?
The soonest they can come out is ten in the morning.
translation.es: Vendrán a las diez de la mañana.

translation.en: You're cute for an older guy.
I said I'd never fuck anyone older than my dad.
translation.es: Dije que nunca me acostaría con alguien más viejo que mi papá.

translation.en: Take it easy on his old ass. You're gonna kill him before I get a chance to.
translation.es: Cálmate con el viejo, lo matarás antes de que yo lo haga.

translation.en: [Karl chuckles] He'll die a lucky man.
-Let's take this fucker out. -[Facundo] Yes, ma'am.
translation.es: - Acabemos con el maldito. - Sí, señora.

translation.en: -[Facundo] Where the hell is he? -[Sindy] Under the bed!
Fuck! I can't see him, can't see Sindy, can't see shit.
translation.es: ¡Carajo! No los veo ni a él ni a Sindy.

translation.en: Facundo, what the hell is going on?
You make mistakes when you're afraid.
Because that's what I get paid to do, Duncan.
translation.es: Porque me pagan por hacerlo, Duncan.

translation.en: [Hilde] You'll be dead before we leave here.
translation.es: Antes de nos vayamos, estarás muerto.

translation.en: [Duncan] Well, in that case, I guess I wouldn't want you to leave, then.
translation.es: Entonces, no querré que te vayas.

translation.en: You can't always get what you want, old man. Goodbye.
translation.es: No siempre tendrás lo que quieres, viejo. Adiós.

translation.en: -I need a name. -Fuck you, you cunt!
[Jane] Alexei? Did you get the girl?
-What the fuck's going on, man? -You tell me.
We was told to go and fetch the girl and shit.
translation.es: Dijeron que buscáramos a la chica.

translation.en: The girl the old man bought a gift for.
translation.es: A la que el viejo le compró un regalo.

translation.en: What the fuck do I know?
Don't be sad. You'll find a new girlfriend.
translation.es: No estés triste, encontrarás otra novia.

translation.en: Shouldn't be a problem with your hot looks.
I'm gonna cut him into pieces and feed him to the rats!
translation.es: Lo cortaré en pedazos, y se los tiraré a las ratas.

translation.en: I told you not to fuck with him.
translation.es: Te dije que no te metieras con él.

translation.en: I'm gonna chop his balls off and shove them down his throat!
translation.es: Le cortaré las bolas, ¡y se las haré tragar!

translation.en: What you should do is pay Duncan his fuckin' pension
translation.es: Lo que debes hacer es pagarle la pensión a Duncan

translation.en: and enjoy the rest of your life.
and kidnapping his cute little neighbor,
I'm sick of giving you advice.
[man over PA] Give it up for our own king of the road, Porter.
translation.es: Aplaudan a Porter, el rey del camino.

translation.en: Oh, you got time to have a drink with a dying man.
translation.es: No tienes tiempo de beber con un moribundo.

translation.en: [Porter] One for me and one for my friend here.
translation.es: Una para mí y otra para mi amigo.

translation.en: They did try to kill you.
Once in Belarus and once at my place.
translation.es: Primero, en Bielorrusia, luego, en casa.

translation.en: You know, I had the worst winter of my life...
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Pasé el peor invierno de mi vida...

translation.en: Somewhere in your contract is a bunch of words
translation.es: En alguna parte de tu contrato, hay unas palabritas

translation.en: that says if you die before retirement,
translation.es: que dicen que si te mueres antes de retirarte,

translation.en: all the money goes back to the company,
translation.es: el dinero vuelve a la empresa,

translation.en: unless you've named a next of kin,
translation.es: a menos que hayas nombrado a un pariente,

translation.en: and who in our business has a next of kin?
translation.es: pero ¿quién, en nuestro negocio, tiene parientes?

translation.en: And you are costing the company...
translation.es: Y tú le cuestas a la empresa...

translation.en: How much they owe you? Three?
Okay. Do you know where they would keep the girl?
translation.es: ¿Sabes dónde podrían tener a la chica?

translation.en: Your guess is as good as mine, but, uh, she's probably in the mansion.
translation.es: Seguro pensaste lo mismo que yo: ella debe de estar en la mansión.

translation.en: Enough for all of his perverted stunts.
I've only been in that building once.
I had to shake that disgusting creature's hand.
translation.es: Tuve que darle un apretón de manos a ese asqueroso.

translation.en: And I-- I want to tell you something.
You were just too good, you know.
Take it for what it's worth.
Send someone over, clean this place up.
translation.es: Envía a alguien a limpiar el lugar.

translation.en: And that cannot be repaid with a swift, impersonal death.
translation.es: Eso no puede pagarse con una muerte rápida e impersonal.

translation.en: When the English caught the traitor William Wallace...
translation.es: Cuando los ingleses atraparon al traidor William Wallace...

translation.en: they dragged him naked through the streets for six miles
translation.es: lo arrastraron desnudo por la calle durante casi 10 km

translation.en: so that peasants could smear their warm, fresh piss and shit on him.
translation.es: para que los campesinos orinaran e hicieran caca sobre él.

translation.en: Then the executioner cut off his cock and balls,
translation.es: Luego el verdugo le cortó el pito y las bolas,

translation.en: and then served them for him to eat.
translation.es: y se los sirvió para que él comiera.

translation.en: He slit his guts right open, huh, and pulled them out.
translation.es: Lo cortó y le arrancó las tripas.

translation.en: He could literally see and smell his own intestines.
translation.es: Él vio y olió sus propios intestinos.

translation.en: because the traitor had hurt the king.
translation.es: porque el traidor había lastimado al rey.

translation.en: I guess Wallace hurt England pretty bad.
translation.es: Parece que Wallace sí que lastimó a Inglaterra.

translation.en: You hurt me pretty bad, Mr. Vizla.
translation.es: Usted sí que me lastimó, Sr. Vizla.

translation.en: I have four days before I have to kill you.
translation.es: Me quedan cuatro días antes de matarlo.

translation.en: I'm gonna have a little fun...
So I've given it some thought,
and I've decided that we're gonna start... with these.
translation.es: y decidí que comenzaremos... con esto.

translation.en: [Blut] The fun continues tomorrow, Mr. Vizla.
translation.es: Mañana seguirá la diversión, Sr. Vizla.

translation.en: [Blut] The fun continues tomorrow, Mr. Vizla.
translation.es: Mañana seguirá la diversión, Sr. Vizla.

translation.en: Well, I can't just do one side and not the other.
translation.es: Lo hice de un lado, ahora, del otro.

translation.en: I said, you've broken my favorite--
I'm obviously not getting through to you, am I?
translation.es: Es obvio que no me entiende, ¿no?

translation.en: The fun continues tomorrow, Mr. Vizla.
translation.es: Mañana seguirá la diversión, Sr. Vizla.

translation.en: Well, don't just stand there. Kill him!
-[gun cocks] -[woman] Who the fuck are you?
No. I need your phone, Jazmin.
-Jesus. What the fuck happened to you? -Phone!
[Blut] Quiet. Try and keep him on the line.
translation.es: Silencio. RASTREO GPS Mantenlo en línea.

translation.en: -Please, tell me you got him. -No, no luck. Not long enough.
translation.es: - Dime que lo encontraste. - No bastó. SEÑAL PERDIDA

translation.en: We have to keep him on the line longer.
-Is she even worth it? -Not when I'm done with her.
translation.es: - ¿Ella lo vale? - No cuando la acabe.

translation.en: Because when I'm done with them,
they're both going to be fucking dead!
How many men do you have left?
You're not going anywhere soon with all that shit in your system.
translation.es: No irás a ningún lado con esa mierda en tu sistema.

translation.en: [Jazmin] Okay, Duncan. How can I help you? What do you need?
Okay, here we go. You'll need all of it.
[Jazmin] I always knew you'd come back.
I was just hoping it'd be for me, not the guns.
translation.es: Esperaba que fuera por mí, no por las armas.

translation.en: -[Blut] Did we trace that? -We're working on it.
We have his general vicinity, but we need another call.
-You'd better be right. -I'm always right. Let's go!
-[Vivian] What's the deal? -Me for the girl.
-[Duncan] An even trade. -I know. You already said that.
translation.es: - Un intercambio justo. - Sí, ya lo dijiste.

translation.en: Central Train Station, nine a.m. tomorrow.
translation.es: En la estación central, a las 9 a. m.

translation.en: Why the fuck are you doing this?
I don't know. I like her.
translation.es: No sé, ella me cae bien.

translation.en: This is our fucking job, remember?
You used to have one and be good at it.
translation.es: Solías trabajar de esto... y eras bueno.

translation.en: Jesus! It has a name. And you remembered it.
translation.es: ¡Por Dios! Ella tiene nombre, lo recordaste.

translation.en: And you have a face I won't forget. You better not pull a fast one tomorrow.
translation.es: Y tú, un rostro involvidable. No hagas nada raro mañana.

translation.en: Unless you want to hide for the rest of your life, Vivian.
I'm afraid it's a bit too late for that now.
translation.es: Ahora es demasiado tarde para eso.

translation.en: [Vivian] And to think, you've been hiding out just around the corner.
translation.es: Y te escondiste a la vuelta de la esquina.

translation.en: I like the eye patch. Very fancy.
translation.es: Me gusta el parche, qué sofisticado.

translation.en: [Duncan] And you look extraordinary, as always.
Time to die, Herr Black Kaiser.
translation.es: Es hora de morir, Herr "káiser negro".
- Creí que ya no fumabas. - Sí.

translation.en: Was I on the phone too long?
Guess we do get rusty when we turn 50.
I know they pay you well for this, Vivian.
translation.es: Sé que te pagan bien por esto.

translation.en: But I'm still gonna give you a chance to walk out of here alive.
translation.es: Pero te permitiré sobrevivir e irte.

translation.en: Me for the girl. An even trade.
translation.es: La chica por mí. Es justo.

translation.en: You keep saying that, but you don't have anything to trade with.
translation.es: Sigues diciendo eso, pero no tienes nada que cambiar.

translation.en: You are at a dead end.
The road that you have chosen doesn't have a rainbow.
translation.es: El camino que elegiste no tiene un arco iris.

translation.en: Yes, come here, you fucking fuck!
[guard] Let's get the fuck outta here!
Is Mr. Blut expecting you, sir?
I'll fetch you a cup of coffee, sir.
-[Blut] Bring me the girl. -[man on phone] No.
No fuckin' way. You're on your own.
-What do you mean you won't--Hello? -[dial tone]
[Camille] I always wonder-- ...be to find him. [voice echoes]

translation.es: y decirle lo que hizo. FAMILIA ASESINADA

translation.en: Do you think it would be difficult to kill someone?
translation.es: ¿Crees que sería difícil matar a alguien?

translation.en: [Paul] Will you be making the same charity donation?
translation.es: ¿Hará la misma donación a la caridad?

translation.en: You are always the only one I see.
translation.es: Siempre fuiste el único que veía.

translation.en: Everyone else is there when I close my eyes.
translation.es: Cuando cierro los ojos, están todos.

translation.en: I feel my brother's soft cheek on my shoulder.
translation.es: La mejilla de mi hermano en el hombro.

translation.en: His hair smelled of little boy.
I can feel my mother's warm hand wrapped around mine.
translation.es: Siento cómo mi madre, cálida, me toma la mano.

translation.en: All of her is warm because she's about to have my baby sister.
translation.es: Se siente tibia porque está embarazada de mi hermanita.

translation.en: I can smell the cigarette my father just put out.
translation.es: Huelo el cigarrillo que papá apagó.

translation.en: He smelled of cigarettes and aftershave.
translation.es: Olía a loción para después de afeitar.

translation.en: Why didn't you just shoot me?
It was not supposed to happen.
-I was given the wrong information-- -Don't talk.
Every day, I pray that I'd died that night.
Yeah, I didn't learn about it until I turned 21.
I thought, "Follow the money," as they say.
translation.es: Y seguí la corriente, como se dice.

translation.en: It wasn't as hard as I thought.
translation.es: No fue tan difícil como creía.

translation.en: It just took me a while to go there.
[scoffs] I thought that if I saw you,
I might get my family back when I closed my eyes.
translation.es: recuperaría a mi familia al cerrar los ojos.

translation.en: You didn't recognize me when we met at the store?
translation.es: No me reconociste en la tienda

translation.en: You know, the first time we met?
You paid all this money and you didn't even know what I looked like?
translation.es: ¿Pagaste tanto dinero y no sabías qué aspecto tenía yo?

translation.en: I didn't want to disturb you.
I don't want to see you anymore.
I want you to go away.
And I want them to come back.
Do you know who wanted my father dead?
translation.es: ¿Sabes quién quería asesinar a mi padre?
